import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from 'axios' const Profile =()=>{ const [userData, setUser] = useState({ name: "", email: "", password: "", phone_num: "", age: "" }); let navigate = useNavigate(); let id = localStorage.getItem('id'); axios.post(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/get/`+id) .then(res => { // console.log(user); console.log(res.data); setUser({...userData,[this.target.name]:res.data.name}) setUser({...userData,[this.target.email]:res.data.email}) setUser({...userData,[this.target.age]:res.data.age}) setUser({...userData,[this.target.phone_num]:res.data.phone_num}) setUser({...userData,[this.target.password]:res.data.password}) console.log(...userData.name); // dispatch(signup(res.data.name)); // localStorage.setItem('id',res.data.id ) }) return( <>

); }; export default Profile;
